ApplicationFormProduct.name: ApplicationFormProduct
ApplicationFormProduct.description: Represents a junction between the application and the product requested by an applicant.

ApplicantVisibleStatus.description: Specifies the status of the application form product that is visible to the applicant.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application that's submitted for a product request.

DisbursementMethod.description: Specifies the method of disbursement for the loan amount.

HasAutomaticPayment.description: Indicates whether the applicant opted in for automatic payments (true) or not (false).

HasElectronicStatement.description: Indicates whether the customer opted in for electronic statements (true) or not (false).

IsAtmCardRequired.description: Indicates whether an ATM card is required (true) or not (false).

IsCheckbookRequired.description: Indicates if a checkbook is required (true) or not (false) for the application form product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanType.description: Specifies the type of loan being requested.

Name.description: The name of the Application Form Product record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

OwnershipType.description: The type of ownership for the application form product.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the application form product.

RequestedAmount.description: The amount requested as part of the application.

RequestedTerm.description: The length of the loan in months.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the application form product that is submitted by the applicant.
